alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wayne County through 345 PM CDT... At 254 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Waynesboro, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waynesboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
